summary: This document is an email chain between US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing the drafting of a sharing order application related to Jeffrey Epstein's estate documents, specifically concerning trust and will materials received from estate attorneys. The correspondents are coordinating language about including revocations and noting the absence of references to 'Trust Two' documents.

events.title: Email discussion on Epstein sharing order
events.description: Email correspondence regarding the drafting of a sharing order application for Epstein estate documents, focusing on the inclusion of trust and will materials and noting the absence of 'Trust Two' documents.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from January 2020 regarding a sharing order for Epstein estate documents.
Correspondents are discussing the inclusion of trust and will documents received from estate attorneys.
A note is made that 'Trust Two' documents are not referenced in any will and may be excluded from the sharing order.
The email references a '2019 Trust' but questions the availability of documents for it.
The communication is between personnel at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
